member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Invoices.IInvoiceCollection.Query(Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Query.IQuery)
member.summary: Queries invoices associated to the partner.
member.param: The invoice query. The can be used to build queries. Invoice queries support simple and indexed queries. You can retrieve subsets of invoices by providing an indexed query and specifying the index to start from and the page size to retrieve. You can also filter invoices using their dates. lists the supported search fields. You can use the enumeration to specify filtering operations. Supported filtering operations are: greater than, greater than or equals, less than, less than or equals, equals, and not equals. You can also compose compound filters that use the AND and OR field filter operations to retrieve a specific invoice subset.
member.returns: The invoices that match the given query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Invoices.IInvoiceCollection.QueryAsync(Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Query.IQuery)
member.summary: Asynchronously queries invoices associated to the partner.
member.param: The invoice query. The can be used to build queries. Invoice queries support simple and indexed queries. You can retrieve subsets of invoices by providing an indexed query and specifying the index to start from and the page size to retrieve. You can also filter invoices using their dates. lists the supported search fields. You can use the enumeration to specify filtering operations. Supported filtering operations are: greater than, greater than or equals, less than, less than or equals, equals, and not equals. You can also compose compound filters that use the AND and OR field filter operations to retrieve a specific invoice subset.
member.returns: The invoices that match the given query.

member.summary: Groups behavior related to Azure subscription utilization records.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Utilization.AzureUtilizationCollectionOperations.#ctor(Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.IPartner,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Utilization.AzureUtilizationCollectionOperations.Query(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationGranularity,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieves utilization records for the Azure subscription.
member.param: The starting time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The ending time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The resource usage time granularity. Can either be daily or hourly. Default is daily.
If set to true, the utilization records will be split by the resource instance levels. If set to false, the utilization records will be aggregated on the resource level. Default is true.
An optional maximum number of records to return. Default is 1000. The returned resource collection will specify a next link in case there were more utilization records available.
member.returns: The Azure resource utilization for the subscription.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Utilization.AzureUtilizationCollectionOperations.QueryAsync(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationGranularity,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves utilization records for the Azure subscription.
member.param: The starting time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The ending time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The resource usage time granularity. Can either be daily or hourly. Default is daily.
If set to true, the utilization records will be split by the resource instance levels. If set to false, the utilization records will be aggregated on the resource level. Default is true.
An optional maximum number of records to return. The returned resource collection will specify a next link in case there were more utilization records available.
member.returns: A task that returns the Azure resource utilization for the subscription.
